Really wish this series had just spent more time with the childhood friend. She's adorable and there are so many things they could have done. For example, it could have had ten or so panels that alternated between Hiroki getting beaten and closeups of a girl that looks like Nao moaning in delight in a dark room. Kinda like an implication that Hiroki subconsciously understands that his actions are only making the foreign student appear more attractive, and he can expect only one outcome if he fails to turn the fight around. Beyond that, actually show the second fight where we get to see Nao reveling in Hiroki getting beaten roughly again by the man she chose. Brevity is effective in this little story but I just wish for more detail.

Let's start off positive, the art is pretty alright. I don't like to think of this as a work unto itself, but rather something of a proof of concept/sketch to convince the author/others into thinking it's worth expanding into long form. Though I can't decide whether the art looks as low detail as it is because it's supposed to be a prototype or if the author should have put more effort into it because it was a fresh idea. Regardless, I wish it was a little bit more detailed. As for the content, I am into NTR. I am also into raceplay, doesn't matter which way it goes (ex. Black>white, White>black), to give you an idea of what a fucking degenerate I am. Betrayal, I find incredibly hot whether I imagine I'm the one doing it or experiencing it. This appeals to me with neither kink, which is saying something. Hard to make me feel anything when it's four pages long. I know someone is going to say "it's hentai, relax" but that doesn't mean you shouldn't be critical of what we consume
